name: Bash
description: Damage and stun the target for 1 turn.

name: Fireball
description: Damage and burn the target for 1 turn.

name: Quick Strike
description: Strike to damage the target twice.

name: Cleave
description: Strike the target and then cleave all opponents for slightly less damage.

name: Cleave All
description: Cleave all opponents for slightly less damage.

name: Stun
summary: is stunned and unable to act this turn.
description: The inflicted cannot act this turn.

name: Burn
description: The inflicted takes burn damage this turn.

name: Soul Steal
description: Strike the target and deal bonus magic damage. Recover a portion of your magic damage dealt as HP.

name: Soul Manipulation
description: Deal bonus magic damage. Recover a portion of your magic damage dealt as HP.

name: Leech
description: Recover a portion of your magic damage dealt as HP.

name: Flare
description: Damage all enemies and burn them for 1 turn.

name: For Faith
description: Deal magic damage to the target and gain a stack of Succor (max: 4 stacks).

name: Succor
description: Casting a healing spell removes all stacks of Succor. There can be a maximum of 4 stacks of Succor. For each stack, increase your next healing spell's power by 15% of its base potency. At 3 stacks, grant healed allies a 2-turn health-regen buff. At 4 stacks, additionally grant allies a spell shield.

name: Health Regen
description: Regenerate a portion of your health this turn.

name: Spell Shield
description: Remove any status effects that would be applied by the next attack.

name: Death's Door
description: Strike the target and apply a stack of The Cursed (max: 4 stacks).

name: The Cursed
description: Casting a Fear inducing spell removes all stacks of The Reaper's Curse. There can be a maximum of 4 stacks. The inflicted takes 15% increased damage from Reaper class users.

name: Pressure Point
description: Strike the target and apply the activated chakra point's status effect.
